title: Scrub Field
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is flat to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
